item.title: 대학원
item.description: Admissions Please visit the offical admissions for graduates course 개설과목(대학원) 학점번호 교과목 설명 ATM6101 ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION 1 radiation law. solar and terrestrial radiation. radiative process in the atmosphere. principle of remote sensing. ATM6102 CLOUD AND PRECIPITATION PROCESSES structure and patterns of cloud, cloud microphysics and precipitation mechanism, artificial rain ATM6103 ATMOSPHERIC DYNAMICS I conservation principle. approximation

item.title: 학부
item.description: Admissions Please visit the offical admissions for undergraduates course 개설과목(학부) 학점번호(단위) 교과목 설명 ATM1001 (1000) 날씨와 기후 (Weather and climate) 지구온난화, 오존층 파괴, 대기오염, 산성비, 사막확장, 엘리뇨/
